duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist management in establishing project requirements for project quality control in civil and structural segments.
Train and test craft personnel on proper techniques and procedures.
Perform rebar, form, concrete, earthwork, and structural steel inspections throughout the site to ensure quality conformance.
Review project requirements, determine minimal requirements for examinations, inspections, or tests, and coordinate the required procedures.
Provide technical assistance to project management in selecting construction procedures and techniques.
Coordinate and schedule required examinations, inspections, or tests.
Complete and maintain inspection, test, examination, and Quality Control Records.
Assure implementation of job site Q.C. Program.
